name: Go4Circle vzw/asbl
goal: defending interest of Belgian private waste companies by informing them on the last legal developments and preserving their interests when negotiating new laws.  promoting the circular economy

euInitiatives: Circular economy package, waste management, waste hierarchy, recycling, environmental protection, safety employment of low-skilled personnel
